usageDescription: You have to syncronize {{toSync}} with {{setted}} via adding or substracting hours and minutes untill time on {{toSync}} clock won't be the same as on {{setted}}, then press 'SET' on adjusted clock
freeUsageDescription: You can adust both clocks as you wish
runningWarningMessage: To {{operation}} {{entity}} you need to stop a clock by pressing 'SET' button!
wrongClock: You are trying to adjust {{wrong}} clock, but need to modify {{right}} clock!
wrongAdjustmentMessage: Your adjustment are wrong, try again
descriptionMeta: Learn how to use analogue clock
keyWordsMeta: Analogue Clock, clock learining, clock, studying
